hero.title: Discover Milfontes in Style
hero.subtitle: Tuk-Tuk Adventures along the Vicentine Coast
hero.description: Explore Vila Nova de Milfontes and surroundings in a unique tuk-tuk experience. Stunning landscapes, history and guaranteed fun!

benefits.title: Why Choose
benefits.subtitle: Comfort, fun and unique experiences guaranteed for the whole family

exclusiveRoutes.title: Exclusive Routes
exclusiveRoutes.description: Access to unique locations and panoramic views that you can only reach with our specialized tuk-tuks

familyComfort.title: Family Comfort
familyComfort.description: Safe and comfortable vehicles, ideal for families with children and people of all ages

quickReservation.title: Quick Reservation
quickReservation.description: Simple and fast WhatsApp booking system. Confirm your tour in just a few minutes

pricing.title: Transparent
pricing.subtitle: Fair and clear prices, no surprises. Guaranteed fun for the whole family!
pricing.basePriceDesc: Fixed price up to 2 people per tuk-tuk
pricing.additionalPeopleDesc: €3.50 for each additional person (maximum 4 people per tuk-tuk)

explore.title: Explore
explore.subtitle: Like Never Before
explore.description: Discover the best kept secrets of Vila Nova de Milfontes and Vicentine Coast from a unique perspective
explore.panoramicViewDesc: Enjoy the best views of the Alentejo coast
explore.historicHeritageDesc: Learn about the rich history of this fishing village

availability.title: Real-Time
availability.subtitle: Check available times and book your perfect moment
availability.reserveSpecificTime: To book a specific time, use the reservation form

0.quote: Diogo Caria is a fantastic guide! It was a great experience, I loved discovering places I didn't know in Milfontes.
0.name: Ana Silva

1.quote: Amazing tour! The tuk-tuk is super comfortable and the views are breathtaking. I recommend 100%!
1.name: Luisa Almeida

2.quote: We guarantee a professional and fun service. Unforgettable tours!
2.name: Sónia Santos

3.quote: We discovered incredible places we would never find on our own. An unforgettable experience!
3.name: Unique Experience

4.quote: The tuk-tuks are modern and safe. The whole family had a great time during the tour!
4.name: Guaranteed Comfort

5.quote: Even at special events, the service is impeccable. Fun and joy at every moment!
5.name: Guaranteed Fun

faq.title: Frequently
faq.subtitle: We clarify your main doubts about our tuk-tuk tours
faq.q1: How many people fit in a tuk-tuk?
faq.a1: The tuk-tuk can carry 4 people plus the driver.
faq.q2: Do tours operate in the rain?
faq.a2: Our tuk-tuks have covers, but in case of heavy rain, we can reschedule at no cost.
faq.a3: We recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance, especially during high season.
faq.a4: Yes, we offer special discounts for groups. Contact us for more information.
faq.a5: Yes, all our tuk-tuks are equipped with seat belts and are perfectly safe for children.

cta.title: Ready for the
cta.description: Book your tuk-tuk tour now and discover Milfontes in a unique and unforgettable way!
